Class NumberMethods

java.lang.Object
nl.naturalis.common.NumberMethods
public class NumberMethods
extends Object
Methods for working with Number instances.

Ayco Holleman

  • Method Details

    • fitsInto

      public static <T extends Number> boolean fitsInto​(Number number, Class<T> targetClass)
      Returns whether or not the specified Number can be converted into an instance of the specified Number class without loss of information.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of Number to convert to
      Parameters:
      number - The Number to convert
      targetClass - The type of Number to convert to
      Returns:
      Whether or not conversion will be lossless

    • abs

      public static <T extends Number> T abs​(T number)
      Returns the absolute value of the specified number.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the number
      Parameters:
      number - The number
      Returns:
      Its absolute value
